mapper.select: select sum(o.totalPrice) from orders o,employee e,branch b where e.employeeId = b.employeeId and b.branchId = o.branchId and e.employeeId = #{employeeid,jdbcType=INTEGER}
SELECT COUNT(*)from orders o,employee e,branch b where o.branchId = b.branchId and b.employeeId = e.employeeId and e.employeeId = #{employeeid,jdbcType=INTEGER}
